Board of Directors Meeting - Q1 Review

March 25, 2025 | 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM EST
Executive Conference Room, 42nd Floor
Microsoft Teams: https://teams.microsoft.com/l/meetup-join/19%3ameeting_NzExYjk

Required: All board members, Richard Thompson (CEO), Patricia O'Neill (CFO), James Williams (COO)

Agenda:
10:00 - Opening remarks
10:15 - Financial review (Patricia O'Neill)
11:00 - Strategic initiatives (James Williams)
12:00 - Working lunch
12:45 - Risk assessment (Audit Committee)
1:30 - Executive session

Contact: Karen Stevens (k.stevens@company.com)
